segments.text: I notice the woman standing there, seemingly oblivious to the cascade of water at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is intense, but I can't help but feel frustrated at her lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen, with its tidy appearance, belies the chaos lurking in the shadows, and that bothers me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy, stretching for cookies, seems so innocent, yet I feel anger bubbling up inside me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just a cookie, but it's the principle of it; stealing sweets without permission feels wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't turn away from the potential disaster this scene could transform into at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Maybe the woman will turn around and notice before it's too late, but I doubt it.
segments.speaker: PAR
